snippet: On Monday, Columbia University officials canceled Bacchanal, a campuswide concert scheduled for next month. Student groups argued the move was made to reduce sexual assaults on campus, while school officials denied that harassment concerns played a...
abstract: Columbia University cancels campuswide concert Bacchanal, following months of criticism about school's policies on addressing sexual assaults on campus; student groups say move was made to reduce sexual assaults on campus but school officials deny harassment concerns played a part in decision.
lead_paragraph: On Monday, Columbia University officials canceled Bacchanal, a campuswide concert scheduled for next month. Student groups argued the move was made to reduce sexual assaults on campus, while school officials denied that harassment concerns played a part in the decision.

headline.main: Columbia Cancels Concert Amid Safety Concerns
headline.print_headline: Columbia Cancels Concert Amid Safety Concerns
